column5: 3 bedroom 2 bath private home with sleeping accommodations for 10. Bedroom 1 consists of 1 King Bed, Bedroom 2 1 Queen Bed, Bedroom 3 2 Sets of Bunk Beds, Living Room has sleeper sofa. 2 Bathrooms, all rooms share full kitchen and beautiful outdoor patio! Booking is for whole house. All Villas provide free Wifi, Cable TV, private coffee bar, toiletries, plush robes, private entrance, parking, and access to the tasting room within walking distance.
